intro_only_event_multi_za_login/6901_100: Thanks for helping me train today, May!

Right back atcha! It was a close battle,
wasn’t it!

Yeah! Wasn’t it the best, battling with
Mega Latios and Mega Latias?!

Mega Evolution is so much stronger when
Trainers and Pokémon have a tight bond!

It’s Evolution that goes even further,
surpassing limits...

By the way, did you know there’s a place in
Kalos that has deep ties to Mega Evolution?

I wonder if there are still Mega Evolutions
out there that we haven’t seen before.
If so, I bet they’re strong!

Y’know, now that I think about it, I really
wanna make sure I don’t lose!
Hehe! That’s so like you, Brendan!

Are my Pokémon and I all ready?
Of course we are!
intro_only_event_multi_za_login/6902_100:
All right! Now that we’ve decided to form
a team of three, let’s introduce our partners!

She loves basking in sunlight, and her leaves
give off a sweet aroma!

I feel so calm and relaxed whenever I catch
a whiff!

She can deftly dodge attacks while shooting
fireballs from her nose! So she’s pretty
nimble, despite her looks!

But...when she catches a cold, that fire
becomes pitch-black smoke instead...
OK, I guess that leaves my Totodile!

With those big jaws, she won’t hesitate to
chomp at anything that moves!

They’re well-developed, so she can crunch
into pretty much anything!
I’m so excited to see how everyone battles!
They’re all different but so wonderful!

OK, team! Let’s head out for our first battle
together!
intro_only_event_multi_za_login/6903_100:
Oh, you want to stay at the
Hano Grand Resort?

Yeah! It’s the biggest resort in Alola, so I
wanna enjoy it at full power!

Come to think of it, didn’t we meet there,
at my father’s hotel?

Apparently, it’s fully booked for a
whole year...

If I ever get the chance to stay there,
I wouldn’t mind checking out the golf course!

*chuckle* If you do, I’ll gladly teach you how
to play.

Be prepared to see the moves I learned as
I traveled the world!

By the way, Kahili! Are there any sights you
still want to see?

Let’s see... I suppose I’d like to visit
Lumiose City in Kalos.

I’ve heard they have fancy cafés and
high-class hotels.

As the daughter of a hotel owner,
I’m interested indeed.
I sure hope we can visit Kalos someday, too!
